original_title: The Girl, The Hunter, & The Firefly
overview: The six months of darkness finally arrived to Bogot√° and the rest of the world, and with them the promises of anarchy and terror of the so called "Hunters". Ana a little 12 year old girl must escape from the city with her parents to protect their lives; locked up inside a bunker, Ana, Mateo and Angela will await underground hoping to avoid the horrors of the surface. Meanwhile, without the benefit of a refuge, John, a 35 year old man, will have to run with his wife, Laura, in order to protect the life of their unborn child.
title: The Girl, The Hunter, & The Firefly
